揕字的基本解释

揕
zhèn
用刀剑等刺：持匕揕之。
击。

揕
zhēn
砍木头的声音。

揕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhèn］
［《廣韻》知鴆切，去沁，知。］
(1)刺。
(2)击。

揕字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　揕； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页442第03
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?知鴆切，砧去聲。擬擊也。【史記·荆軻傳】左手把秦王之袖，右手持匕首揕之。　又【正韻】職任切，枕去聲。義同。　又【集韻】知林切，音砧。刺也。一曰斫木聲。　又陟甚切，讀與枕近。亦刺也。與戡同。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Collection of Mao】【Handwriting Department】　揕; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: Page 442 03
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Know the dumb cut, the anvil goes away. Simulated attack also. [Historical Records·Jing Ke Biography] The left hand holds the sleeve of King Qin, and the right holds the dagger.　[Zheng Yun] Responsible for the job, sleepless. The same meaning.　 [Ji Yun] Zhi Lin Qi, sound anvil. Thorn too. One said the sound of wood.　You Zhi Shiqi, reading close to the pillow. Also thorn too. Same as Kan.
